name: XeliumTech Solutions
description:
XeliumTech is a global Mobile App Development Company with its presence in five countries; India, US, UK, China, and Taiwan. Started in the year 2010, XeliumTech is focused on developing tailor-made Mobile, Web, and Software Solutions for multiple verticals i.e. travel, hotel, manufacturing, real estate, healthcare, retail, marketing, education, and many more.
We have a team of highly dedicated and skilled 100+ professionals who provide bespoke Mobility, Website, Robotics, Software, RPA, and Cyber Security Solutions based on the requirements of the clients.
We offer remarkable solutions to startups, budding ventures, and large scale companies with the right tactical approach to molding their ideas into reality.
With the eagerness to deliver the best, we keep on exploring the latest trends and technologies along with implementing the same while developing any project. We have successfully delivered more than 500 projects with a high success rate.
Our Key Services:
- Mobile App Development (Android and iOS)
- Cross Platform, Hybrid
- Robotics and IoT Solutions
- Robotic Process Automation
- CMS Development (AEM, Hybris, Sitecore, Magento, Drupal, WordPress)
- Machine Learning, Artificial Intelligence
- Web and Software Application Development
- Full Stack Development
- Cyber Security Solutions
- Digital Marketing Services
